84638.「キキーッ！ ニンゲンノ ニオイダ！\n クッテヤル！ クッテヤル！ クッテヤル:
KEE! IT SMELLS LIKE HUMAN! I'M GONNA KICK,
KICK, KICK YA!

84639.レンダーシア貿易の 要として機能している\n海洋都市リンジャハル。その長を務めて:
The maritime city of Linjahar serves as the
hub of Lendersia's trade. The city was headed
by a young but brilliant summoner.

84640.その召喚士リンジャーラは 学徒時代\n我が主と 互いに競い 助け合う\nよき友だ:
That summoner, named Linjara, was good friends
with my Lord during their student days. They
competed and helped one another.

84641.アストルティア最大の大国 エテーネ王国と\n物流の要 リンジャハル。その未来を担:
The future leaders of both the Ethene Kingdom,
Astoltia's greatest power, and Linjahar, a key
logistics hub, may have had some connection.

84642.しかし ひと月前に リンジャハル住民の\n３分の１が 命を落とす 恐ろしい疫病が:
But just a month ago, a terrible plague
claimed the lives of a third of Linjahar's
people. And because of that...

84643.我が主が 正式に エテーネ王国の使者として\n強大なチカラを持つ かの宝珠をたず:
My Lord is now officially an emissary of the
Ethene Kingdom, and is to travel to save
Linjahar with a powerful jewel.

84644.遠く 海都を見つめる 主の横顔はきびしい。\nひさしぶりの ご友人との再会が\n:
My Lord's profile staring at the distant city is quite grim. It must be painful to visit your friend after so long in such a terrible
situation...
